nodes.text: Message to Spacers 2: Cardan-Class Space Station

Message to Spacers 2: Cardan-Class Space Station was the second article in the Message to Spacers series of articles that was posted on Wizards.com for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game. It was written by Patrick Stutzman and published on June 26, 2008. The article featured the Cardan-class space station.
